divs: Sighting Detailsi happened to be gazing at the stars on my terrace as usual.I noticed a star really bright.after a few seconds, i noticed it move in the south - east direction on a curved path.i ran in to call my friend out .both of us were astonished.we saw it move really quick as if it was gaining speed n then all of a sudden, the light started to dim quickly .unfortunately we did not have any camera to record or even take a picture..:(
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ooty
There were no other sightings in Ooty on or around January 6th 2012
Summary: at first stationary then stated to move in S-E direction ascending and the light quickly disappeared
